items.content_html: Uber-Style Preloading Animation A lightweight recreation of Uber’s iconic preloading animation using Vanilla JavaScript and GSAP. This project demonstrates how to achieve smooth, customizable animations with minimal dependencies.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: qodalis-solutions/angular-web-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: ✍️ Medium-Like Blogging Application: A full-featured blogging platform inspired by Medium. 🛠️ Tech Stack: Frontend: React and Tailwind CSS for a sleek, responsive UI. Backend: Honō (Cloudflare Workers) for lightweight, serverless logic. Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM and connection pooling. 🚀 Features: 📝 Rich blogging functionality
items.title: shubhampawar4841/Medium: ✍️ Medium-Like Blogging Application: A full-featured blogging platform inspired by Medium.  🛠️ Tech Stack:  Frontend: React and Tailwind CSS for a sleek, responsive UI.  Backend: Honō (Cloudflare Workers) for lightweight, serverless logic.  Database: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM and connection pooling.   🚀 Features:  📝 Rich blogging functionality
